format_data: [{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "Hourly Report\n{{ doc.hour_slot }}"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "ts_percent", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Truck and Shoval %"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}]

{# Clear unsaved flags to suppress warning #} {% set print_settings = { "page_size": "A4", "orientation": "Portrait", "margin_top": "10mm", "margin_bottom": "10mm", "margin_left": "10mm", "margin_right": "10mm" } %}

Total Coal BCMs{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.total_coal_bcm) }}
Total Truck & Shoval BCMs{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.total_ts_bcm) }}
Number of Production Trucks{{ doc.num_prod_trucks }}
Average BCM per Truck{{ "{:,.1f}".format(doc.ave_bcm_prod_truck) }}

No excavator activity

{% else %}

BCMs by Excavator

{% set ns = namespace(shovels={}) %} {% for load in doc.truck_loads %} {% if load.asset_name_shoval %} {% set curr = ns.shovels.get(load.asset_name_shoval, 0) %} {% set _ = ns.shovels.update({ load.asset_name_shoval: curr + (load.bcms or 0) }) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% for name, total in ns.shovels.items() %} {% endfor %}
{{ name }}{{ "{:,.0f}".format(total) }}
{% endif %}

MtD BCM per Hour{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.mtd_bcm_hour) }}
